name: Bus & Taxi Driving Simulator
description:
Get your driving gloves on and begin your new career as a Bus & Taxi driver! Pick up passengers and take them to their destinations on time, and Park your vehicle neatly on increasingly complex routes.

FEATURES:
▶ 5 ICONIC WORLD TAXIS – from New York, London and more!
▶ 7 BIG BUSES – cars seem to easy? Challenge yourself with steering a big bus!
▶ PASSENGERS TO PICK UP – drive them to their destinations quickly and efficiently!
▶ REALISTIC HILLTOP CITY – explore it at your leisure or get to the destination as quickly as possible

Start your career in Iconic Taxis from around the globe and move on up to the collection of world-famous BIG and LONG Busses! Regardless of what you drive, your task will be similar – picking up the passengers and getting them to their destinations quickly and safely.

You will start out driving iconic, easily recognizable taxis. Feel like a cab driver in London in a famous Black Cab, switch to a Classic Yellow American Chequer Cab, check out some of the European favourites and more! Realistic and fun handling will make every trip an experience for you and your passengers!

When you’ve gained enough experience driving taxis, take up the challenge of steering a big bus around some of the cities tightest corners! Stick to your route and to your timetable, be careful not to crash with your passengers! Pass every mission with the New York Bus, Tour Coaches, London Bus, Classic Yellow School Bus and huge Bendy Bus!

The Main Game Mode including ALL vehicles is 100% FREE to Play, all the way through, no strings attached. In-Game Coins may be purchased with real money to speed up access to some vehicles and extra Game Modes that alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through In-App Purchases.
